Usage:    <CommandLineOptions>...                                                                 
Description:                                                                                      
Command Line tool for windows-store operations                                                    
                                                                                                  
List of available options:                                                                        
install    Install a specific product                                                             
queue      Listen for progress notifications for a specific product or all queued products        
pause      Pause the given product                                                                
cancel     Cancel the given product                                                               
resume     Resume the given product                                                               
update     Check for updates for a given product or all installed products                        
hydrate    Download document for a given product                                                  
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Usage:            <ProductId>                            
Description:

--ForceNonSD      Force installation to non SD           
--TargetVolume    Target Volume                          
--User            User to install for
